name: 張淑美
objective:
內容包括高分子聚合反應，高分子結構及其物理性質。並包含高分子物性的鑑定及高分子流變學和加工。另就橡膠、塑膠、纖維，由結構、性質、用途、產品，做比較和說明。
A major objective of this course is to provide a background in polymerizations, polymer structures and polymer properties. The material in this course also covers polymer characterization, polymer rheology and polymer processing. In addition , structures, properties, usages and products of rubbers, plastics and fibers are emphasized and compared.
schedule:
1. Introduction to polymer science (1 wk)
2. Polymer structure(morphology) (2 wks)
3. Molecular weight of polymers (2 wks)
4. Step-reaction polymerization or polycondensation reactions (3 wks)
5. Mid-term exam (1 wk)
6. Ionic chain-reaction and complex coordinative polymerization
    (addition polymerization) (2.5 wks) 
7. Free radical chain polymerization (addition polymerization) (2 wks)
8. Copolymerization (1 wk)
9. Inorganic polymers (2.5 wks)
9. Final exam (1 wk)
scorePolicy:
Homework and attendance (30%)
Mid-term exam (30%)
Final exam (40%)
materials: Introduction To Polymer Chemistry (Charles E. Carraher, Jr.) 4th ed., 2017, CRC Press.
consultation: 1.line 群組討論 2. 教師辦公室 (分子系二樓) 或 email:f10914@mail.ntut.edu.tw
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG12：負責任的消費與生產（Responsible Consumption and Production）
